meta.description: Qt5 port of Django template system

license.fullName: GNU Lesser General Public License v2.1 only

meta.long_description:
Grantlee is a plugin based String Template system written using the Qt
framework. The goals of the project are to make it easier for application
developers to separate the structure of documents from the data they
contain, opening the door for theming.

The syntax is intended to follow the syntax of the Django template system,
and the design of Django is reused in Grantlee.
meta.name: grantlee
